turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a Starbucks drink please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What can I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a vanilla iced latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size vanilla iced latte would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a trenta please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like whole milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like to add anything else to your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to add caramel drizzle please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Adding caramel drizzle. Which location would you like to pick up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick up at the Frisco, Texas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I just want to confirm your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. go ahead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want a trenta vanilla iced latte with whole milk and caramel drizzle.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct. Can I also add three splendas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink will be ready in twenty minutes at the starbucks location in Frisco, Texas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Goodbye.
